alert.note: Alert for Grand and Battlement Mesas (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 08 at 8:12PM MST until March 10 at 5:00PM MST by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 10 inches with locally higher amounts possible. * WHERE...Grand and Battlement Mesas...including Highway 65. * WHEN...From 11 PM this evening to 5 PM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult with icy and snow packed roads, and reduced visibility. A detailed map of the snowfall can be found at: www.weather.gov/gjt/winter.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
